author: chabotc
msg: Small cleanup to the metadata interface: urldecode the request string, and give higher priority to the post['request'] var (in case someone has always_populate_raw_post turned on in their php.ini)

author: stack
msg: HBASE-930 RegionServer stuck: HLog: Could not append. Requesting close of log java.io.IOException: Could not get block locations. Aborting...

author: etnu
msg: Skipped sending Content-Disposition headers for flash, which is breaking Flash 10. This reduces our phishing protection, which means that we'll need to come up with a better solution in the long term.

author: mcconne
msg: Synchronize v20 and v21 testsuites before applying any more testsuite patches
